measured_by: Alpha parameter from the power-utility choice model
justification: “Alpha is the estimated parameter of interest for risk attitude, where risk is defined as outcome variability.”
“We also report results using Proportion of Risky Choices … as a more coarse-grained measure of risk preference.”

topic_or_construct: valuation of friend outcome relative to self
measured_by: Weightfriend parameter from the modified expected-utility model
justification: “Weightfriend (w) represents how much one’s utility is based on one’s own outcome in contrast to how much one incorporates their estimation of their friend’s outcome.”

measured_by: Simulated earnings (proportion of total possible earnings)
justification: “Simulated earnings were computed … modeled as proportions of the total possible earnings … and were analyzed as Dependent Measures.”
